original_text: But he will become afraid when he hears news from the east and the north. It will cause him to be very angry. He will go with his army to destroy many people.
korean_text: 그러나 동북에서부터 소문이 이르러 그를 번민하게 하므로 그가 분노하여 나가서 많은 무리를 다 죽이며 멸망시키고자 할 것이요

sentences.original_text: when he hears news from the east and the north
sentences.korean_translation: 동쪽과 북쪽에서 오는 소식을 들을 때

sentences.original_text: It will cause him to be very angry
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 그를 매우 화나게 할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: He will go with his army
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그의 군대와 함께 갈 것입니다
